Reviews.Title: Borescope Inspection Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Works as described. A couple of things to note:- the screen is detachable and once detached continues to show the camera output seamlessly. Nice feature- Image and video quality is good.- The LED lights in the end of the probe are reasonably effective but don't expect too much in narrow tubes - the foreground will be overexposed and the background underexposed - something you have to expect and not what I'd consider a fault.All in all a bargain basement borescope that works well. No complaints!
